name: Sex and Zombies
description:
What would you do if you spend another boring summer in the city, when everyone has gone on vacation, and the only entertainment outside is a zombie apocalypse? Of course, arm yourself and go shoot your new brainless friends before they get to your brains!Features 12 different weapon types - from revolvers and assault rifles to sniper rifles and grenade launchers
Fast dynamic runs
Apple or zombie liver? The answer is not so obvious - collect items that give you various bonuses and power-ups
Waves of enemies, each is longer and more violent than the previous one. How long will you stand?
But you don't fight only for yourself, do you? 6 beautiful girls who will thank you for saving them
